#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int t,n,num,min,i;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
              scanf("%d",&n);
              scanf("%d",&min);
              long long sum,k;
              sum=min;
              for(i=1;i<n;i++)
              {
                              scanf("%d",&num);
                              sum+=num;
                              k=sum/(i+1);
                              if(k<min)
                              min=k;
              }
              printf("%d\n",min);
              
    }
    
    return 0;
}
